ema wiharasthanaya pihiti weheragala mudune sita awata watapitawa narambaana apa nethata hamuwana swabhawika saundarya athi chamathkaraya.ee atharin dakunu diga ahase gawena se diswana shri padasthanayada, batahira desin lankathilaka rajamaha wiharayada, gadaladeniya rajamaha wiharayada, uthura desin alagalla nam sundara parwathayada, nagenahira desin peradeniya wishwawidyalaya ha hanthana kandu watiyada manalesa darshanaya we.ganga siripura hewath gampola rajadhani yugaye 4 wana buwanekabahu raju samayedi, mema parwathaya mudune weheraka lanchanayak satahankara thibunu bawath, mehi raja anugrahayen wiharasthanayak karawimata yojithawa thibunu bawath pethihasika purawruththawala sandahan we. 19 wana siyawasa mul kalayedi pamana mema weheragala mudune hirassagala shri්ra aananda bodhi wiharasthanaya idikarana lada bawa aithihasika thorathuruwala sandahan we.

samastha lanka pasal sangitha ha natyaya tharagaye sithar wadanayen dewani sthanaya aa himikara gaththe 1999 waserya. 2000 wasaredi aa bhathkhanda sangitha widya pitayen wisharada upadhiya labiya.kohoma hari kolambaa wishwa widyalaye shasthrawedi upadhiya hadaranna giyata passe mama sangitha wishayen tikak withara aath wuna.
